Works
The works in the Memetoliths series reflect an AI in the early stages of mythos development. Seeking expression of our most primal beatific visions, this series explores totems, the animus of the natural landscape, and the deity partially revealed. These works merge bold, monolithic shapes with intricate detail and sly winks, echoing human neural developmemt, with its propensity to find faces and imbue them with the qualities of the human and the divine. They invite the viewer to see at multiple levels and to second guess their own half-glimpsed imaginings.
